channel.title: tauri on Boy's Life
channel.description: Recent content in tauri on Boy's Life

item.title: Webview2 Tauri bypass CORS
item.description: item version tauri 2.0.0-rc Prerequisites When you use javascript at foo.com to access bar.com/api, you may encounter an error like the one below (but you are able to access it using curl): 1Access to fetch at 'bar.com/api' 2from origin 'foo.com' has been blocked by CORS policy: 3No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header is present on the requested resource. 4If an opaque response serves your needs, set the request's mode to 'no-cors' to fetch the resource with CORS disabled.

item.title: Use vue-devtools in tauri
item.description: Tauri claims itself as an un-opinionated, agnostic desktop application framework that does not depend on a specific front-end framework. Vue is very popular among developers for its simplicity and ease of use. Vue Devtools is a small tool that displays the details of a vue program in the browser console. Today we combine them and demonstrate how to configure Vue Devtools in a new tauri project. Prerequisites Creating a tauri project, remember to choose vue as the front end framework.
